title: Fatal compromise
creator_credit: MAFILM Pannonia Filmstudio and Josef Gemes
brief_description: A superbly animated production that details the lengths to which a love-smitten hedgehog will go in order to gain the attention of a rather large feline character. However the hedgehog does not quite get what it bargained for. Suitable for primary school level.
